description: Attorneys Jeff Foreman and Jim Watson founded Foreman Watson, LLP, now known as Foreman Watson Holtrey, LLP, in 1994 with the goal of providing high-quality real estate legal services to the residents of northwestern Kentucky and southern Indiana. In the years since our firm's founding, our firm's growth has been continuous. In 2008 the partners made the business decision to branch out in the fields of law, hiring four attorneys and opening a satellite office located in Hartford, Kentucky...
